comments:
Description:
EvaluatorException when set font style in report items' onCreate method. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached design file in html

Expected result:
Font style works

Actual result:
FontFamily/fontStyle/fontVariant/fontWeight/fontSize didn't work and exceptions were thrown.

Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "style.fontFamily="Arial"".

Added the missing set methods, so this should be fixed.

causedBy.message: Java class "org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.script.internal.instance.StyleInstance" has no public instance field or method named "fontFamily". (#1)
